item.Q:
Write the character:
name; noun (part of speech); place (e.g. among winners); famous; classifier for people
item.A:
míng
著名 zhùmíng famous; noted; well-known; celebrated

shí
布尔什维克 (布爾什維克) bùěrshíwéikè bolshevik

traditional: 謝
xiè
感谢 (感謝) gǎnxiè (express) thanks; gratitude; grateful; thankful; thanks

item.Q:
Write the character:
day; sun; date; day of the month; abbr. for Japan
item.A:
rì
日本 Rìběn Japan; Japanese

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: just (right); main; upright; straight; correct; principle
2: Chinese 1st month of year
item.A:
1: zhèng 2: zhēng
正确 (正確) zhèngquè correct; proper 正月 zhēngyuè first month of the lunar new year

item.Q:
Write the character:
open; operate (vehicle); start; abbr. for degrees Kelvin
item.A:
traditional: 開
kāi
开始 (開始) kāishǐ begin; beginning; start; initial

item.Q:
Write the character:
dialect; language; spoken words; speech; talk; words; conversation; what sb said
item.A:
traditional: 話
huà
的话 (的話) dehuà if

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: and; to give; together with
2: take part in
item.A:
traditional: 與
1: yǔ 2: yù
与其 (與其) yǔqí it's better ... than ... 参与 (參與) cānyù to participate (in sth)

item.Q:
Write the character:
real; true; honest; really; solid; fruit; seed
item.A:
traditional: 實
shí
实际 (實際) shíjì actual; reality; practice

item.Q:
Write the character:
to love; affection; to be fond of; to like
item.A:
traditional: 愛
ài
爱国 (愛國) àiguó patriotic; love of country; patriotism

item.Q:
Write the character:
again; once more; re-; second; another
item.A:
zài
再生 zàishēng to be reborn; to regenerate

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: abbr. for China; magnificent; splendid; flowery
2: Mountain in Shaanxi; surname
item.A:
traditional: 華
1: huá 2: Huà
新华社 (新華社) Xīnhuáshè Xinhua news agency 华山 (華山) Huàshān Mt Hua in Shaanxi, western of the Five Sacred Mountains 五嶽|五岳

èr
十二月 shíèryuè December; twelfth month

item.Q:
Write the character:
city walls; city; town
item.A:
chéng
城市 chéngshì city; town

item.Q:
Write the character:
to use; to act; to move; to change
item.A:
traditional: 動
dòng
运动 (運動) yùndòng movement; campaign; sports

item.Q:
Write the character:
(particle used for comparison and "-er than"); to compare; to contrast; to gesture (with hands); ratio
item.A:
bǐ
比较 (比較) bǐjiào compare; contrast; fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather

item.Q:
Write the character:
fade; side; surface; aspect; top; face; flour; noodles
item.A:
miàn
方面 fāngmiàn respect; aspect; field; side

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: surname
2: high; tall
item.A:
1: Gāo 2: gāo
提高 tígāo raise; increase 提高 tígāo raise; increase

item.Q:
Write the character:
(once) again; also; both... and...; again
item.A: yòu

item.Q:
Write the character:
maybe; perhaps; might; possibly; or
item.A:
huò
或者 huòzhě or; possibly; maybe; perhaps

fāngmiàn respect; aspect; field; side
tígāo raise; increase
Rìběn Japan; Japanese
huòzhě or; possibly; maybe; perhaps

traditional: 實現
shíxiàn to achieve; to implement; to realize; to bring about

traditional: 實行
shíxíng implement; carry out; to put into practice

traditional: 為什麼
wèishénme why; for what reason
wèishěnme why

traditional: 動作
dòngzuò movement; motion; action
zhèngzài in the process of (doing something or happening); while (doing)
xìamian below; next; the following; under; below
shàngmian on top of; above-mentioned

traditional: 那樣
nàyàng that kind; that sort

traditional: 事實
shìshí a fact; the fact that

traditional: 行動
xíngdòng operation; action; to move; mobile
zhēnzhèng real; true; genuine

yímiàn one side
yīmiàn one side

traditional: 的話
dehuà if
zuìgāo highest; highest-level
rúcǐ in this way; so
shìqíng affair; matter; thing; business
